title: (x) Bed Head - VT Corona {Magnus}
content:
okay i need to try to recreate this logo, anyone know if they used a certain font for this? I almost want to think so because the E's are identical. but that doesn't mean a whole lot. anyway, any help would be appreciated.   
   
 ![small](http://web.archive.org/web/20090718151146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39818.jpg)   
 ![larger](http://web.archive.org/web/20090718151146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/39819.gif)
author: pablohoney77

comments.content: You might try searching on the term 'Typewriter fonts'. There is one site I know comes up when I run this search, but I think maybe that's as close as I want to point you in case there are any 'gray' fonts involved, if you know what I mean.

This is [VT Corona](http://web.archive.org/web/20090718151146/http:/www.vintagetype.com/vintagetypewriter/corona/index.html) from Vintage Type.   
   
magnus

that'll do the trick!   
thnx guys!
